text: Jyare allaha ta'ala'e kahyum ke he isa! Hum tamane pure puro levano chum ane tane mari tarapha uthavi la'isa ane tane inkari'othi pavitra karisa ane taru anusarana karanara'one inkari'o para vijaya apisa, kayamatana divasa sudhi, pachi tamare dareke mari ja tarapha pacha pharavanum che, hum ja tamara andara andarana matabhedono phesalo karisa
